comment:
CR-081 pre-review: COMPLIANT. All verification items passed.

FRONTMATTER: title = "Fix tmux default terminal dimensions" (present, non-empty). revision_summary = "Initial draft" (acceptable for v0.1 per SOP-001 Section 5.1).

CONTENT (Sections 1-9, pre-approved scope per SOP-002 Section 6): All required sections present and substantive. Purpose clearly identifies the 80x24 tmux default causing visual misalignment. Scope includes context, changes summary, and files affected. Current State and Proposed State are concise and well-defined. Change Description provides detailed technical implementation across three subsections (backend config, tmux creation, frontend resize). Justification addresses problem, impact of inaction, and root cause. Impact Assessment covers files, documents, and other impacts. Testing Summary describes three manual verification items. Implementation Plan has five sequenced steps.

EXECUTION SECTIONS (10-11): Template placeholders present as expected at pre-review stage. These sections are editable during execution per SOP-002 Section 6.

PLACEHOLDER CHECK: No TBD, TODO, FIXME, or XXX found in Sections 1-9. None found.

FORMATTING: Section numbering sequential and correct (1-12). Markdown formatting consistent. Tables properly formatted. Code blocks annotated. No typos or grammatical errors found.

TRACEABILITY: CR-080 referenced as discovery context (closed per git history). SOP-001 and SOP-002 referenced.

DOCUMENTS AFFECTED: None -- no controlled documents require revision. Hub backend and GUI frontend are not under SDLC governance. No RS/RTM impact.

No TU assignment required. The changes affect agent-hub infrastructure (config, container management, GUI hooks) which are outside the Flow State SDLC-governed domains (UI, Scene, Sketch, Simulation).

Recommend for approval.

POST-REVIEW: CR-081 v1.2 -- COMPLIANT. Recommend for approval.

FRONTMATTER:
- title: "Fix tmux default terminal dimensions" -- present and non-empty.
- revision_summary: "EI-4 complete, execution summary filled, VAR-001 closed" -- present, descriptive, acceptable for self-authorizing executable document.

PRE-APPROVED CONTENT INTEGRITY (Sections 1-9, 12): Verified unchanged from pre-reviewed v0.1. All sections intact: Purpose, Scope, Current State, Proposed State, Change Description (3 subsections), Justification, Impact Assessment, Testing Summary, Implementation Plan, References.

EXECUTABLE BLOCK (Section 10 - Execution):
- EI-1: Pass. Added default_terminal_cols/rows to HubConfig at config.py:50-52 with env var support. Evidence sufficient (file path, line numbers, env var names).
- EI-2: Pass. Modified _exec_claude() at container.py:278-292 to pass -x/-y flags. Evidence sufficient (method, file path, line range).
- EI-3: Pass. Added resize send in dispatch() subscribed handler at useHubConnection.ts:137-142. Evidence sufficient (file path, method, line range).
- EI-4: Pass. Manual testing revealed deeper scrollback issue; CR-081-VAR-001 (Type 1) created, executed, and closed. Original verification criteria satisfied through VAR resolution -- control mode inherits 120x30 defaults and subscribe-time resize. Evidence sufficient.
- Execution Comments: Two entries documenting manual test deferral and VAR lifecycle. Consistent with EI narratives.

EXECUTION SUMMARY (Section 11): Complete narrative covering all four EIs, the VAR deviation, and confirmation that all original objectives are met.

SOP-002 SECTION 7.3 POST-REVIEW REQUIREMENTS:
1. Execution Complete: All 4 EIs Pass -- SATISFIED.
2. Blocking VARs Resolved: CR-081-VAR-001 (Type 1) confirmed CLOSED at v2.0 -- SATISFIED.
3. Documentation Approved: No controlled documents modified -- N/A, SATISFIED.
4. Evidence Documented: All EIs have execution summaries with specific evidence -- SATISFIED.
5. SDLC Prerequisites: Hub infrastructure not under SDLC governance per Section 7.3 -- N/A, SATISFIED.

QA POST-REVIEW VERIFICATION (SOP-002 Section 7.3):
- All EIs show Pass -- VERIFIED.
- Type 1 VAR CLOSED -- VERIFIED.
- No SOPs/controlled docs in scope -- VERIFIED.
- No RS/RTM impact -- VERIFIED.

PLACEHOLDER CHECK: None found. No TBD, TODO, FIXME, XXX, or bracket placeholders.

FORMATTING/ERRORS: No typos. Section numbering correct (1-12). Markdown tables well-formed. Code blocks fenced. Consistent formatting throughout.
